Colors

The main SecureDrop color is Light Blue. Use Dark Blue as a secondary option and Dark Red as accent color.

Typography

Our main typography is Fira Sans made by Mozilla.

H4 display

SecureDrop

Paragraph Fira Sans Regular

SecureDrop is an open source whistleblower submission system that media organizations can install to securely accept documents from anonymous sources.

Code Snippet Fira Mono 

          $('.rb-sidebar').on('click', 'a',function() {
              $('.rb-sidebar a.active').removeClass('active');
              $(this).addClass('active');
          });
